A bit about myself

I'm Nahuel Scotti. This is my personal website.

I'm a full stack developer living in Barcelona, currently I'm working at B-REEL.
I've worked at DoubleYou for several years as Flash developer.
I make apps in HTML5, Javascript, Node.js, Ruby on Rails among others technologies.

I speak Spanish and sometimes Italian.

Disclaimer This website contains thoughts, ideas, and opinions that are my own and they don't necessarily reflect those of my current or past employers.
